concept.title: Chronosweeper
concept.description: A frantic top-down 2D dodge-em-up where players must navigate treacherous, ever-shifting temporal anomaly zones, avoiding hazardous anomalies and temporal echoes to reach the stable exit point.
concept.theme: Retro-futuristic, temporal paradoxes, glitchy, unstable environments
concept.objective: Reach the exit portal of each temporal zone before it collapses, collecting fragmented temporal energy along the way.
mechanics: Momentum-based dash (Spacebar) that can break through certain obstacles but has a cooldown
Environmental hazard avoidance (temporal rifts, time distortions, paradox fragments)
player_abilities: Temporal Shift (short burst of invulnerability and speed boost, limited uses per level)
Echo Trace (reveals the path of upcoming temporal anomalies for a short duration)
Kinetic Rebound (upon dashing into specific wall types, player gains a brief speed burst in the opposite direction)

enemies.name: Temporal Echo
enemies.behavior: Patrols a set path, leaving a temporary damaging trail. Dissipates if player moves too far away, but respawns elsewhere.

enemies.name: Anomaly Sentinel
enemies.behavior: Stationary but emits periodic pulsing energy waves that cause disorientation and damage. Becomes more aggressive when player is near.

enemies.name: Paradox Shard
enemies.behavior: Randomly teleports within a small area, creating localized spacetime distortions that attract and damage the player. Small but fast.

powerups.name: Chrono-Charge
powerups.effect: Instantly refills the Temporal Shift ability.

powerups.name: Stabilizer Fragment
powerups.effect: Grants temporary immunity to environmental hazards.

powerups.name: Echo Amplifier
powerups.effect: Extends the duration of the Echo Trace ability.

concept.level_progression: Levels are divided into distinct temporal zones, each with a unique visual theme and a set of increasingly complex obstacle patterns and enemy combinations. Later zones introduce more dynamic environmental changes and larger, more challenging anomalies.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for reaching the exit portal, collecting Temporal Energy fragments, completing levels within a certain time limit, and for near-misses with obstacles. Bonus points for utilizing abilities effectively.
concept.visual_style: A vibrant, stylized retro-futuristic aesthetic with a strong emphasis on glitch art, neon outlines, and dynamic particle effects to represent temporal distortions.  Top-down perspective with slightly isometric elements for depth.  Player character is a sleek, agile entity that leaves a shimmering trail.
concept.sound_theme: A pulsating, synth-heavy soundtrack with glitchy electronic beats and ethereal ambient sounds.  Sound effects are sharp and distinct, emphasizing player actions (dashes, shifts) and environmental dangers (ripples, pulses, distortions) to provide crucial audio cues for survival.

level_design.name: Temporal Anomaly Outbreak
level_design.description: A minor temporal anomaly has manifested, scattering paradox fragments and unleashing nascent chronal entities. Navigate the unstable environment, collect the scattered fragments, and neutralize the emerging threats to stabilize the area.

assets.player: Blue rectangle representing the player character

enemies.aggressive: Dark red rectangle for aggressive enemy

theme: A game where you avoid obstycles to get to the other side
